subject: Business
title: The Ansoff Matrix: Where to Grow
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Ansoff Matrix: Where to Grow.

hook.text: Should you sell more of what you have or launch something new? Igor Ansoff built a matrix to decide.

buildup.text: Four growth paths: market penetration, market development, product development, and diversification.

twist.text: Most companies overestimate their ability to diversify. They assume competence in their current market transfers.

climax.text: Amazon diversified from books to AWS â€” it worked because cloud computing leveraged existing infrastructure.

punchline.text: Grow where your strengths apply. The further you stretch, the more you risk.
